title: A Seasoned Pro’s Early Bets on Chewy and Eventbrite. Lessons From the WeWork Fiasco.
text:
Kelly Flynn has never been one to turn her back to a slap shot. Growing up in Boston in the 1980s, Flynn played pickup hockey with her cousins, co-captained her high school team, and represented the Crimson for a couple of years while studying history and literature at Harvard University.

After graduation, she made a quick cut to investment banking in New York. “Frankly, I just needed to make some money,” says Flynn, who eventually found her way to equity research. While at Credit Suisse, Flynn made a prescient, but controversial,...
description: Why Winslow Growth Capital’s Kelly Flynn, who views WeWork as an IPO outlier, looked favorably on Chewy, Eventbrite, and CarGurus.
